author: Matthew B
title: Amazing pizza and buffalo mozzarella salad!
text: What a wonderful restaurant- Italian quiet romanic restaurant with excellent food and service - very reasonable prices for rice star quality. We ordered Parma pizza which came piled with arugula and shaved Parmesan cheese, and the deserts were amazing. Creme brûlée and gelato - Joe could you go wrong?! Will make this one of our regular visits. Despite being in the Renaissance Hotel, still feels like a high end neighborhood haunt. Highly recommend and am looking forward to sampling some of the other Italian dishes.
